dmca.title: About-Birthstones.com's bad luck with copyright infringement
dmca.body:
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION

1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.
Main aticles from:
http://www.about-birthstones.com/januarybirthstone.html http://www.about-birthstones.com/februarybirthstone.html
http://www.about-birthstones.com/marchbirthstone.html 
http://www.about-birthstones.com/aprilbirthstone.html http://www.about-birthstones.com/maybirthstone.html http://www.about-birthstones.com/junebirthstone.html http://www.about-birthstones.com/julybirthstone.html http://www.about-birthstones.com/augustbirthstone.html http://www.about-birthstones.com/septemberbirthstone.html 
http://www.about-birthstones.com/octoberbirthstone.html http://www.about-birthstones.com/novemberbirthstone.html http://www.about-birthstones.com/decemberbirthstone.html


2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-01.htm 
http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-02.htm
http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-03.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-04.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-05.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-06.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-07.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-08.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-09.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-10.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-11.htm http://www.hannoush.com/info/26-01-18-12.htm

3. Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you (email address is preferred). 
[private]@about-birthstones.com

4. Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred). [private]@Hannoush-Jewelers.com (from their web site)
[private]@hannoush.com (from the whois record)

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.    

Submitted By: [Private]
